title: Figure, "Seamstress Embroidering a Banner", 1920
markings: underside: Lomonosov "LFZ" mark stamped in blue underglaze; "1920 / N Danko" (in Russian) impressed on side
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Woman with black hair wearing spotted blouse, striped red and blue skirt and beige shawl sits with red banner on lap

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Seamstress Embroidering a Banner", 1920.
1920. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-210.
